BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Animations
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: The Animations bundle offers comprehensive tools for creating, modifying, and capturing animations within the ChimeraX application. It enables users to build a keyframe animation, manage timelines, preview frames, and record animations to files, enhancing the dynamic visualization capabilities of ChimeraX.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Tool :: Animations :: General :: Keyframe animating tool.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations keyframe :: General :: Save a scene to the sessions scene manager.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations timeline :: General :: Show a timeline of the animation in the log.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations play :: General :: Play the animation in the model viewer.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations stop :: General :: Stop the animation if it is playing.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations preview :: General :: Preview a frame of the animation in the model viewer.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations record :: General :: Record the animation to a desired file.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations stopRecording :: General :: Stop the recording early and save the movie file.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations setLength :: General :: Set the length of the animation.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations clear :: General :: Remove all keyframes from the animation manager.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations insertTime :: General :: Insert a segment of time at a target point on the timeline. Shift keyframes accordingly.
ChimeraX :: Command :: animations removeTime :: General :: Remove a segment of time from the timeline. Shift keyframes accordingly.
